title: The Song of Moses
summary: Deuteronomy 32 contains the song Moses teaches Israel, praising God's justice and warning of the consequences of rebellion. It speaks of God’s faithfulness, Israel’s failure, and God's eventual compassion and restoration.

faq.question: What is the purpose of the song?
faq.answer: To serve as a lasting witness to remind Israel of God’s justice and their responsibility.

faq.question: What does the song teach about God?
faq.answer: That He is faithful, just, and compassionate—even when His people turn away.
